short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: a ChatGPT extension promoting the most up-to-date guideliens and citations

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: I've created a Google Chrome Extension where students can easily type the day used they used ChatGPT, and a MLA or APA citation will automatically be generated (based on their preference). Additionally, users can choose between creating a formal citation or an In-text citation. I really want to stress how important having a handy Google extension would be to almost instantly create citations because most students automatic instinct isn't to want to save that citation (especially if they need to use it for MANY ChatGPT conversations) and sometimes students are lazy.
